summary: HAD TO REPLACE REAR U-JOINT. THE DEALER WON'T FIX THE SLIP YOKE THAT HAS NOT BEEN NORMAL SINCE THEY REPLACED THE U-JOINT EVEN THOUGH I'VE BEEN THERE 3 TIMES FOR THAT.  MY MAIN COMPLAINT NOW IS THAT THE RUNNING LAMPS SEEM TO GO OUT TOO OFTEN.I SEE EVERY OTHER SILVERADO (& MAYBE SIERRAS?) ON THE ROAD WITH ONE OF THEM OUT!!! EVEN THOUGH THIS DOESN'T COST THAT MUCH, THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL SINCE THERE'S THOUSANDS OF GM PICKUPS THAT HAVE THIS PROBLEM. THANK YOU.
